content.prompt_es: What is the main purpose of a debate?
content.explanation: El propósito principal de un debate es persuadir a la audiencia sobre un punto de vista, no solo argumentar.

content.prompt_es: Which of the following is a crucial skill in debating?
content.explanation: Escuchar es fundamental en un debate para entender los argumentos del oponente y responder adecuadamente.

content.prompt_es: What should a strong argument include?
content.explanation: Un argumento sólido debe incluir evidencia y razonamiento para ser convincente.
Es importante reconocer y refutar los contraargumentos para demostrar que estás informado y has considerado otras opiniones.

content.prompt_es: What role does body language play in a debate?
content.explanation: El lenguaje corporal comunica confianza y puede influir en cómo se perciben tus argumentos.

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks with the correct words.
content.main_text: In today’s world, the ability to analyze complex texts is more important than ever. Many people find it challenging to (1)___ the arguments presented in various media. Often, these texts require a detailed (2)___ of the author's intent and the context in which they were written. Additionally, the use of persuasive techniques can (3)___ the reader’s judgment. To fully grasp the material, one must approach it with a critical (4)___, questioning the validity of the claims made. Furthermore, understanding (5)___ distinctions between various viewpoints can enhance one’s ability to engage in constructive discussions.
content.explanation:
(1) Interpretar significa entender o aclarar el significado de algo.
(2) Análisis es el proceso de examinar algo en detalle.
(3) Nublar significa dificultar la claridad o comprensión de un tema.
(4) Mentalidad se refiere a la forma de pensar que uno tiene.
(5) Matizado significa tener sutiles diferencias o variaciones.
